elements.prompt: You completed your first Study Burst. Let’s look back on your experience to learn more about the pros and cons of your participation.
elements.title: Great Job!

elements.promptDetail: Now that you’ve completed the Study Burst, what were the benefits to participating?

constraints.patternPlaceholder: Write any benefits that you think the study had.

elements.promptDetail: What do you think the drawbacks were for you to participate? What about the pros of NOT participating in future studies?

constraints.patternPlaceholder: Write any drawbacks that you think the study had.

elements.promptDetail: What do you think the cons might be for NOT participating in future studies?

constraints.patternPlaceholder: Write any cons that you think NOT participating in future studies may have?

elements.prompt: Now that you’ve thought  through this, what would you  like to do?

enumeration.label: I agree to taking part in the  study for 2 years, including  taking part in all 2-week study  bursts asked of me.
I am not willing to agree to this  study at this time.

elements.promptDetail: This study involves engaging in a series of activities that will take 20 minutes per day for 2 weeks at a time.\n\nYou will be able to take a break for approximately 3 months in between these 2 bursts. Do you agree to doing this?
